metadata.name: SpraypaintGPT 1/1
metadata.description:
Series: "SpraypaintGPT"

Piece Title: "RED"

Artist: Thomas Demarais

Date: 2023

Media: Spray Paint on 5in x 7in Cards

Description: This series of abstract spray painted cards represents a bold and energetic exploration of color and form. The artist has utilized a range of techniques, from loose and gestural marks to carefully controlled sprays, to create a dynamic and captivating body of work. The small format of the cards emphasizes the immediacy and spontaneity of the creative process, while the use of spray paint adds a distinctive energy and vibrancy to the pieces.

As part of this exhibition, these pieces have been scanned and turned into Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs), allowing the digital community to experience and own a unique piece of abstract art. This innovative approach to art collecting and display highlights the ever-evolving nature of the art world and the importance of embracing new technologies.

This series is a celebration of the power of color, form, and movement and invites the viewer to experience the joy of abstract expression.
